nodes.text: The Eucer sector was a sector that was located in the Mid Rim region of the galaxy. Planets in the sector included Darlon and Euceron itself.

Around 24,000 BBY, the Eucer sector worlds of Matabre, Cortilium Major, Uthtara, Okator VIII and Ilamna were located in a stretch of space known as "the Divide", which separated the territories of the young Galactic Republic and the Tion Cluster. During the Tionese War, the Honorable Union of Desevro & Tion attacked a number of worlds in the region, including Uthtara and Okator.

During the Separatist Crisis, the sector was represented by Senator Jonas Wallen. He was involved in a gambling scandal in which he was accused of betting on which planets would secede from the Galactic Republic.
